title: Group least likely to receive targeted ads

content.prompt: Businesses have the ability to target advertisements to different groups of people who use RunRoutr. Which of the following groups is LEAST likely to receive targeted advertisements?

choices.label: Individuals who appear on each otherâ€™s contact lists
Individuals who are interested in running and fitness
Individuals who sign up for a premium account
Individuals whose running routes begin or end near a particular business location

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Describe the impact of a computing innovation.
